trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around May 1st 2008
Summary: 1 Blue sphere splits into 2 orange/red spheres.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i got home from a friends house about 2 in the morning and we went out onto the back porch and it wasn't but a few seconds later, i looked up and over the trees there was this blue ball of light flying west and i told my wife to look and then as she saw the blue light, it started splitting into 2 balls and almost instantly turned and orange \ red color as it kept the same speed and kept going across the sky til it was out of visual range. it never made any noise or anything. i will never forget it.
